full_summary:
### Office Furniture Tender Announcement

#### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to supply office furniture to the Department of National Defence (DND) in support of the Government of Canada's procurement strategy.

#### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3764404723
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2022 at 02:00 PM (ES.T)
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entities:** Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
*   **Contract Start Date:** December 19, 2022 (tentative)
*   **Contract End Date:** N/A (open-ended)

#### Supporting Documents

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date and time.

#### Contact Information

*   **Contract Officer:**
    *   Shannon Brewster
    *   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   Email: [shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Links and Resources

*   **Ariba Discovery Posting:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14730107?extsite=MTQ3MzAxMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14730107?extsite=MTQ3MzAxMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: *The renovation to the closing time was sent to interested parties directly via email, and its provisions were a part of the original contact sent to interested parties.*
